website_summaries.verdict: Nice light and an exceptional warranty, but you may have to deal with noise and flickering if you choose it.
pros: Emits light similar to incandescent bulbs
cons: Buzzes frequently and tends to flicker
There is a noticeable delay until full light output is reached

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking LED and solid build quality. I've been using CREE LEDs for things from car interior lighting to simple light fixtures and have never had any issues with them so far. Note: If you plan to put them in a garage do not put them near or install them in the garage door opener as with most LED's they give off small amounts of EMI around the same frequency as most garage door remotes which will reduce your range significantly. There are specific LEDS for those which I have used and work fine (Though they are expensive)
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C Haney

customer_reviews.title: They also make a noise like a tungsten filament in an incandescent light bulb when ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they advertised a less loud buzzing noise when dimming, and dimming more than other bulbs. They do dim quite a bit more than any other dimmable bulbs I've tried, but of the four I got, only one was quiet when being dimmed. One of them seemed about average buzzing noise, and two were the loudest dimmable LED bulbs I've tried. They also make a noise like a tungsten filament in an incandescent light bulb when I tap them. This is slightly worrying as not even the cheapest of cheap chinese ebay LED bulbs do that when I tap them.
customer_reviews.author: Azure

customer_reviews.title: Reliability in the name!
customer_reviews.text: Great lightbulb for just about any application. I was tired of using cheapo light bulbs that just didn't last. I was also tired of buying light bulbs online having them delivered shattered on arrival. I bought these specifically for my garage because the standard filament bulbs would burn out and I didn't want to pay the ridiculous price for garage opener specific bulbs. These do the trick wonderfully. They are constructed of a composite outer shell so there was no worry of them breaking. They are also led and lay much longer than your standard bulbs. I stand by the cree name and love these bulbs. A definite buy in the future
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Bright white lights with a hum
customer_reviews.text: The lights are white and bright, and they’re dimmable. We have 12 of them in our closet on a Leviton smart dimmer switch for 1000W incandescents. The dimmest they go is 10% and they hum no matter what the brightness is. The construction is good and the light produced is even, bright, white, and useful. I probably wouldn’t recommend them because of the hum, though they do get the job done well enough for a closet.
customer_reviews.author: mts

customer_reviews.title: Buzz w/ Lutron Dimmer
customer_reviews.text: I went through several "incompatible" light bulbs with my Lutron Caseta dimmer switch and they all buzzed slightly. These were on the compatible list, but they still buzz. I specifically ordered them with hopes that they wouldn't buzz. I am disappointed. I do like the color and brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Dimming Feature and Very Brite White
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order for these, since I liked them so much in my bathroom and hallway. Now I want them for my Dining room. That they can be dimmed is a great feature, and they work for me without a humming sound. Also bought some other LED light brands in the past, but have had a couple early failures. I have not had a failure with the Cree 60W 5000K. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID Rose

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME BRIGHT! OK should you do the 5000k or the 2700k? Well 3 60w 5000k in a ceiling light basically turned the 20' X 15' living room into an operating room! Yes, It even lit up the front lawn! 5000K ARE BRIGHT! While laughing my head off, the wifes only comment was Yeah, No! I replaced with 2700k (I bought both because I had no idea which would work best).... They were better still required a trip to the home improvement store to get a dimmer switch!
customer_reviews.author: BrianC

customer_reviews.title: buzz buzz buzz
customer_reviews.text: These lights are a reasonable price and put out uniform light. They work great but they buzz like crazy...I purchased multiple packs and used them all over the house but am considering putting them all outside where I won't be able to hear them. Don't use them in a quiet location, they are quie loud.
customer_reviews.author: praxeum

customer_reviews.title: Best bulb!
customer_reviews.text: Light bulb is amazing, so far has lasted a lot longer than most bulbs I've bought. Color of bulb is also white which is exactly what I was looking for. It is also very bright, its a lot brighter than I thought id be which is a good thing. Ive had them a few months now and not a single one has gone out. Id highly recommend and would. buy again. The price is also a great as they are not over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: 5000k is Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the bulbs buzz at any light level with an inline dimmer that I am using but otherwise the 5000k color temperature is perfect and they seem very bright. No issues in a switched fixture. These bulbs are NOT RETURNABLE! I am using them in non-dimming fixtures and they provide an excellent reading/work light.
customer_reviews.author: Flashback

customer_reviews.title: Expected lifetime fell short
customer_reviews.text: 22 months [from the date of purchase] after fairly minimal use one of the Cree (SA19-08150MDFD-12DE26-1-14) LED 60W Replacement A19 Daylight (5000K) Dimmable Light Bulbs from my 4-pack failed. This fell far short of the 10 year (120 month) period specified in Cree's 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. I had higher expectations, especially from a Cree brand. Very disappointing. I will be curious to see how long the remaining LED bulbs last.
customer_reviews.author: JASx

customer_reviews.title: Damn good product
customer_reviews.text: Damn good product i wish i would have looked up the 2700k 60 watts ones though cause i was looking for the daylight ones first and hit one click oh well they will get used one day ! But i can't say enough about the daylight ones....i mean they are bad ass and saves me money in the long run. They are bright enough to light up my entire living room up with just one bulb
customer_reviews.author: TheHop81

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Long Lasting Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I replaced all of the bulbs in my house with Cree bulbs to replace another brand of LED bulbs, These bulbs are better and cheaper to run that the previous bulbs I had. They fit a standard socket, nice and bright, and work every time. The Cree bulbs are built to last and I have had other LED bulbs from Cree that are still going after a few years. I High suggest these Cree bulbs, Wow they make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana DIY

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy Cree if you have a TV antenna.
customer_reviews.text: These look good and perform well, but they totally destroyed my RF channels 7 and 8. I tried them in a fixture with no dimmer switch that's how I narrowed it to the bulb. I replaced them with Phillips Dimmable bulbs that allow me to watch TV.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Brought our Kitchen out of the Dark ages.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced 6 ceiling pot lights with these bulbs and used the Lutron Diva C.L. dimmer and could not be more pleased. Truly brought our kitchen out of the dark ages. I was using the same wattage Philips bulbs from my local big box store and they were no comparison to these Cree's.
customer_reviews.author: KatBat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for bright, DIMMABLE 60W bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I had looked for Philips 60W daylight bulbs, but I couldn't find the dimmable variety; so I tried these instead. They give a beautiful bright light in my bathroom fixture, perfect for personal care such as shaving and for making sure you do a thorough job of cleaning the room. With Amazon's Prime shipping and a current price of about $3.60 a bulb, these are a terrific bargain.
customer_reviews.author: LeeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Cree makes the best LED bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I like the Cree bulbs for their high CRI light and exceptional dimming (they go dimmer than most other LED/CFL bulbs). These daylight bulbs have a 5000K color temperature, which is closer to actual daylight than the colder 6500K common with "daylight" CFL bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: TinyZombie

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What a difference...
customer_reviews.text: Man do I like these. Apart from the energy savings, which is a little abstract anyway, the light is just great. It really is like daylight. I replaced some cfbs and didn't really expect there to be that much difference. I was very, very wrong. I'm never buying anything else for replacement bulbs going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Lee in central MD

customer_reviews.title: Great light for working. Makes every detail clear. For that reason, maybe not great for romance.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, yes, yes: bright light, lasts a long time, apparently lowers electric bill. It's too perfect. That seems to be the only thing wrong with it. Folks, it's a great bulb. Maybe don't use it if you're in the mood for romance because it's, well, really bright.
customer_reviews.author: review2u

customer_reviews.title: Still working
customer_reviews.text: Bought these months ago and they are still going strong. Really like the lighting they provide and bought a few more bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: SLC

customer_reviews.title: Nice LED Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I have well over a dozen CREE LED bulbs in use, and so far I like them. This latest version costs less, and it very price competitive with out name brands. I also use some of their remote control bulbs, and of far they have worked well with the WINK HUB.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Light Indoors
customer_reviews.text: I replaced all the CFL bulbs in the kitchen with these. No lie, the color of the light is like noon on a cloudless day. You can barely stand to look directly at the overhead fixture -- your eyes involuntarily squint as if you're looking at the sun. And they're only 8 watts!
customer_reviews.author: groyal

customer_reviews.title: Bought 10 packs to replace all CFL bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pack of the 60w Daylight last year at Home Depot and they have been great. Using some with the Lutron Caseta Wireless dimmer switch. There is not a single flicker or a buzz with that dimmer. When I saw that they were going for $12.25 a pack a few days ago on Amazon I purchased 10 packs and now replaced all the bulbs in my house. The 820 lumens are bright, but with the dimmer that's not a problem! All my CFL bulbs were 14 watts so thanks to these bulbs I've reduced energy consumption and also the light fixtures will give off less heat.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value. Worked. Great light quality for room light while streaming
customer_reviews.author: Maleficara

customer_reviews.title: Good bulbs
customer_reviews.text: All the good reviews are true. No buzzing and flicking even at the lowest dimmer setting. True to daylight color. Very good.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs if sent correctly
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs themselves are fantastic. However, I had to deal with 4 rounds of purchases, replacements, and returns because they can't seem to read the Kelvin labels. I ordered about 56 bulbs of the 5000K and kept getting 16-20 of the 2700K sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Matt McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Consistent light even when dimmed to a very low setting
customer_reviews.text: Consistent light even when dimmed to a very low setting... Made my wife very happy to have a good quality LED light in her nightstand lamp that she can dim way down.
customer_reviews.author: go930turbo

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Took me forever to realize that if ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Took me forever to realize that if I wanted actual white light (not yellow), I had to go with daylight bulbs. Never going back to "white light" bulbs again
customer_reviews.author: Meghan O

customer_reviews.title: One of four bulbs failed in less than two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: One of the four bulbs in the pack failed after almost two weeks installed. This was installed in a nondimmable kitchen location and was lit about three hours per day.
customer_reviews.author: BillZ

customer_reviews.title: Wow they are bright!
customer_reviews.text: Wow they are bright! If you like light these are great! If you're going for a more mellow light not for you.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good LED for the Price (faint buzz)
customer_reviews.text: Cool light - love LEDs. Getting less and expensive. IS Dimmable, but does have a faint buzz. Then again, every dimmable LED I have bought does too.
customer_reviews.author: grumpyoldgeezer

customer_reviews.title: Best LED bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Best LED bulbs i've found. Love the 5000K and works with zero humming when used with GE Z-Wave switches.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and works with a dimmer. Remember, you get what you pay for. -Kyle
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The cree bulbs deliver the best light quality for led bulbs. Also feel like they are built very well.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: No better LED bulbs on the market!
customer_reviews.text: The best LED lights by the innovators of LED technology!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Works well. But over-priced. I bought some Phillips. Like the quality of light better on the soft white and the price was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina Puffini

customer_reviews.title: Let There Be Light!
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are great! Used them to replace some old CFL's in the bedroom and they definitely light up the room. The cool white makes it look like daylight inside. I'll be adding these to the other rooms in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: They dim as advertised but they don't go off completely ...
customer_reviews.text: They dim as advertised but they don't go off completely in my fixture. When I press off they dim all the way down to theater lighting but stay on. Strange.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Grovenor

customer_reviews.title: highly-rated bulbs and well worth the praise
customer_reviews.text: These are rated as some of the best LED bulbs at incredible prices here on Amazon. I bought these and Cree's SA19-08127MDFD-12DE26-1-14 Led 60W and recommend either one of them
customer_reviews.author: Rick K

customer_reviews.title: Great LED bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Bright, come on fast and are very consistent. My other LED bulbs (different maker) have a slight delay before they come on. These however are instant. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Vispian

customer_reviews.title: Cree 60 watt Dimmable Led bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, bright, and dimmable light bulbs to replace old conventional bulbs in my ceiling fan fixture. Much more brightness and better color level to illuminate my den.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis J. Gaudet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful daylight lighting, can last up to 22 years, uses 80% less electricity.
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all! The other great thing about hard to reach light bulbs is that after replacing it, you may not have to do it again in your lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Church

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations...so far
customer_reviews.text: Too soon for much of an evaluation but the color of the light is right. Bright white vs yellowish. Time will tell if it performs as advertised. Will keep box and receipt if warranty not met...but that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Golfer

customer_reviews.title: These are SUPER bright! They actually might hurt your eyes a ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These are SUPER bright! They actually might hurt your eyes a bit! I wouldn't buy them for a room where you would want to relax...we have them in our office and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great bulbs, great price. I mix the warm and cool in an array of overhead lamps and they mix to just the right color for working on crafts and other tasks.
customer_reviews.author: CarlTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it has a delay when turning on and every now and then flickers.
customer_reviews.author: Biyan

customer_reviews.title: A good product.
customer_reviews.text: A good product...longevity will be the determining factor...if it lasts as long as advertised, it will be a great product!
customer_reviews.author: John Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: Second pack i ordered. I think i only have had one bulb gone out in a spam of a year. excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: mayte

customer_reviews.title: 30 bulbs going strong for 6 mo
customer_reviews.text: Have about 30 of these. Zero issues and they've been installed for 1/2 a year. Love the design and look of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these bulbs. They really brighten up the room a lot without adding to a utility bill.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Works great and the dimming feature allows you to get very ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the dimming feature allows you to get very little light. Works great in my motion sensor lights I have all around my house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs for the right price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the brightness of these bulbs. Looking forward to the cost savings and longevity of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Received the lights today and am well pleased. Lights are BRIGHT, and Dimmable, as advertised. Ordered another pack today.
customer_reviews.author: spaceman

customer_reviews.title: Great Bulb Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Really brightened up the garage over the quality of lighting the standard halogen bulbs produced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great LED bulbs
customer_reviews.text: So far these lights are great! Super bright and the color temp seems perfect! Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Not as quiet as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Update to original review below - I purchased a Lutron MRF2-6ELV-120-WH dimmer to test on these bulbs and others. This dimmer fixed the buzzing, but this dimmer also costs $120 dollars (not a typo). Dimming range did not change using this dimmer. Not as quiet as advertised. I used a Cree compatible dimmer control (Lutron MACL-153) and there is some audible buzz. I might be able to use this as a LED for a table lamp, but because of noise I will try and find another use. Otherwise fairly good dimming (not great) and light output is uniform. These are not as bad as the 40 watt versions from a noise perspective.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P DiFilippo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very bright at only 9 watts, endurance, we don't know yet!
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: 5000k daylight is great for places you need natural light
customer_reviews.text: Clear, bright, instant response. LED is the way to go, 5000k daylight is great for places you need natural light.
customer_reviews.author: Orlandu

customer_reviews.title: "GREAT BULB"
customer_reviews.text: Great bulb for a great price. Saves a bit on the light bill.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are amazing. Brite and white vs regular light bulbs
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: It really is like daylight.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! It really is like daylight. I need about two dozen more..
customer_reviews.author: justmakeitanonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These things are great!. Very bright light for very little wattage.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very bright white bulb that gives off a nice light but is not blinding
customer_reviews.text: Very bright white bulb that gives off a nice light but is not blinding. Hopefully it lasts for a while. I have it controlled by a Lutron MACL-153 dimmer and both are working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Bright light
customer_reviews.text: Gives off a clear white light. Perfect for lighting a dark room. Doesn't get hot like regular light bulbs. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good light
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light for me to read by then turn down to watch TV, would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Billy 5 Speed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No buzzing and has lasted longer than most LED bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This led bulb has no buzzing sound and is fully Dimmable.
customer_reviews.author: IT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! I have been using the bulbs for ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I have been using the bulbs for a few weeks now and our place is so much better lit now than before.
customer_reviews.author: Seamus O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these bulbs work very well for perfect inside and outside. I already ordered another 4 I recommend them
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One bulb isn't working which tells me the brand is not a reliable one.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Kamienchick

customer_reviews.title: We love them! Our house has seemed dark without a ...
customer_reviews.text: We love them! Our house has seemed dark without a lot of sunlight. With these new bulbs, Everything is much brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good ... very bright and is white like I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Ponder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bulbs for dimmers
customer_reviews.text: Love these bulbs. Half the price of what the local big box home store charges for the exact same thing. The light is clean and bright and makes our dining room look like a whole new room (we had warm incandescent bulbs in there before). There is no hum or buzz when on full power or dimmed. I dropped a bulb and it just bounced. No breaking or cracking, still worked perfectly. The bulbs are a lot lighter than CFLs, too. Very happy with this purchase and would absolutely buy and use again.
customer_reviews.author: Radar626Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted like these. I will just have to keep looking
customer_reviews.text: The claim that these bulbs are brighter is completely false. The bulbs I received are very dim and have a bluish green tinge to the light. I prefer a very bright light to read by, and this one I am unable to use for that purpose. It may be ok in a closet? Not sure. Maybe I will put them in the basement. I hardly ever go down there. I really wanted like these. I will just have to keep looking!
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. They do hum just a little in my dim able fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Brickman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the LED bulbs. Cree seems to be the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Parker

customer_reviews.title: Double check your color temperatures!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 boxes of 5000K daylight LEDs but received 1 wrong box with 2700K soft white instead!
customer_reviews.author: BadAndy

customer_reviews.title: you wont be in the dark with these.
customer_reviews.text: color is daylight, and looks good. house uses less energy now. i screw it in, turn on the switch, and boom... light!!! havent tasted them yet, i imagine even whataburger katchup will not help.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Schumann

customer_reviews.title: Tried 3 of these dimmable bulbs - WHAT a GREAT difference! Works better then I could have expected
customer_reviews.text: Ceiling fan lights would not get bright. Thought we would have to trade out the light attachment. Tried 3 of these dimmable bulbs - WHAT a GREAT difference! Works better then I could have expected. Current fixture is now just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weird Light Color
customer_reviews.text: Strongly dislike the light cast by these bulbs. I read about them being recommended for video lighting but they look really bad to me, just awful in the color of light they cast. Total fail.
customer_reviews.author: Colormaiden

product_meta.title: Cree SA19-08150MDFD-12DE26-1-14 Led 60W Replacement A19 Daylight (5000K) Dimmable Light Bulb (4-Pack),
product_meta.description: For people who aspire to create a beautiful and safe home for their family, the Cree LED bulb provides better light, better lifetime, better dimming, all backed by a better warranty. Featuring a cool (5000K), omnidirectional light with high color rendering, the Cree LED bulb is designed to enhance your home and make the colors of your décor appear vibrant, richer and more natural. Fully dimmable and built to light and last, the new Cree LED bulb provides full LED lifetime, over 22 years (25,000 hours) of beautiful, energy-efficient light. Certified Cree LED bulb is a worry-free choice backed by one of the strongest warranties in the industry – a 10 year 100% SATISFACTION guarantee.
feature_bullets: 60 watt replacement a19 LED bulb - uses only 8. 5 watts (820 lumens)
Better light for better colors - high CRI light makes colors appear richer, true and Natual
Long life - 22+ year rated lifetime (lasts over 25, 000 hours)
Fully dimmable. No buzz. No hum

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars149 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
